XData.name: UrlMap
XData.Data:
<Routes>
<Route Url="/test" Method="GET" Call="Test"/> <Route Url="/json/messages/:Table" Method="GET" Call="REST.JSON:GetAllMessages"/>
<Route Url="/json/connect/:ClientID" Method="GET" Call="REST.JSON:GetConnect"/> <Route Url="/json/disconnect/:ClientObjectID" Method="GET" Call="REST.JSON:GetDisconnect"/> <Route Url="/json/hasmore/:ClientObjectID" Method="GET" Call="REST.JSON:GetHasMore"/> <Route Url="/json/publish/:ClientObjectID" Method="POST" Call="REST.JSON:PostPublish"/> <Route Url="/json/subscribe/:ClientObjectID" Method="POST" Call="REST.JSON:PostSubscribe"/> <Route Url="/json/unsubscribe/:ClientObjectID" Method="POST" Call="REST.JSON:PostUnsubscribe"/> <Route Url="/json/messages/:ClientObjectID" Method="POST" Call="REST.JSON:PostMessages"/> </Routes>
